author: NASS
description:
I used a new colorization technique, restored and created a sound design for this Rare footage of Paris in the early 1930s. Wander the grand boulevards with bustling traffic and elegant Parisians, admire iconic landmarks like the Eiffel Tower and Arc de Triomphe, and experience daily life at markets and cafés. Enjoy parades, festivals, and military processions, catch glimpses of artists, fashion, and Montmartre’s charm, and soak in the vibrant nightlife with illuminated cabarets and bustling streets.

Video Restoration Process:
✔ FPS boosted to 60 frames per second 
✔ Image resolution boosted up to HD 
✔ Improved video sharpness and brightness 
✔ Colorized only for the ambiance (not historically accurate)
✔added sound design only for the ambiance
✔restoration:(stabilisation,denoise,cleand,deblur) 

Please, be aware that colorization colors are not real and fake, colorization was made only for the ambiance and do not represent real historical data.

B&W Video Source from:  National Arc
title: A Day in Old Paris 1930s in Color [60fps, Remastered] w/ Sound Design Added
